column5: Report Monster Beverage Considers Expansion Into Alcohol Cannabis KO MNST benzingacommarketscannab

MNST KDP and KO are our favorite picks within beverage majors as they are currently at FCFF margin greater than 20 and EV to FCFF below 40x Monster CocaCola UPCHY FQVTF VTSYF EMBVF PEP BTVCY
Within the beverages industry MNST and KO are the best investments with EV to EBITDA at almost 25x and EBITDA margin near 35 VTSYF is the most overvalued company here UPCHY FQVTF EMBVF KDP PEP BTVCY
